mapper.insert: insert into search_result( key_char , rank , pc_search_num , include_num , page_title , search_content , search_date) values (#{keyChar} , #{rank},#{pcSearchNum},#{includeNum},#{pageTitle},#{searchContent},#{searchDate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from search_result where search_content = #{searchContent} and search_date = #{searchDate};
